.power Vdd=1
.thresholds Vol=0 Vil=0.1 Vih=0.9 Voh=1

.group inputs A[31:0] B[31:0] cin
.group outputs S[31:0]

.mode gate

.cycle assert inputs tran 99n sample outputs tran 99n

00000000000000000000000000000000 00000000000000000000000000000000 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL // 1
11111111111111111111111111111111 00000000000000000000000000000000 0 HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH // 2
00000000000000000000000000000000 11111111111111111111111111111111 0 HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH // 3

00000000000000000000010010001010 00000000000000000000001101101000 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHHHHHHHLLHL // 4
00000000000000000000000110001001 00000000000000000000000011000010 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHLLHLLHLHH // 5
00000000000000000000010001011010 00000000000000000000001001101000 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHHLHHLLLLHL // 6
00000000000000000000000000011111 00000000000000000000000110010011 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHHLHHLLHL // 7
00000000000000000000011100000001 00000000000000000000001010111101 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHLLHHLHHHHHL // 8 
00000000000000000000000010000110 00000000000000000000000101101010 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHHHHHLLLL // 9
00000000000000000000001010100111 00000000000000000000000000010100 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHLHLHHHLHH // 10
00000000000000000000010111111101 00000000000000000000000000100100 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHHLLLHLLLLH // 11
00000000000000000000010010001111 00000000000000000000001100111100 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHHHHHLLHLHH // 12
00000000000000000000011100001010 00000000000000000000011111000011 0 LLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLHHHLHHLLHHLH // 13


.plot X(A[31:0])
.plot X(B[31:0])
.plot cin
.plot X(S[31:0])
